name: Knight pants
description:
A game about brave little knights.

Defend your castle from damn enemy knights and keep your pants dry! 

Controls and gameplay:

Click on the castle to train a new knight. Click on an empty space and your selected knight will go to that point. Click on an enemy knight to make your knight attack him. 

Every knight can be attacked only by 2 enemy knights(from the front and back side)

Defend your castle as long as you can! Good luck!

The game was born during the Ludum Dare 41. All assets and code was created during the jam in 3 days.
